      • getMenuOption

        public static int getMenuOption​(java.lang.String title,
                                java.lang.String... options)
        This method display the numbered list of options and prompts the user choose an option. The numbering starts from 1.
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the menu
        options - the options
        Returns:
        the selected option

      • getLabelledItem

        public static <T extends LabelledItem> T getLabelledItem​(java.lang.String title,
                                                         T[] labelledItems)
        This method display the numbered list of options and prompts the user choose an option. The numbering starts from 1.
        Type Parameters:
        T - a class that implements the LabelledItem interface
        Parameters:
        title - the title of the menu
        labelledItems - the options of type T
        Returns:
        the selected T object

      • getLabelledItem

        public static <T extends LabelledItem> T getLabelledItem​(java.lang.String title,

        This method display the numbered list of options and prompts the user choose an option. The numbering starts from 1.
        Type Parameters:

        Parameters:
        title - the title of the menu
        labelledItems - the options of type T
